SEARCH
Package splendor.controller

Class ClientServerController

java.lang.Object
splendor.controller.ClientServerController
public final class ClientServerController extends Object
The ClientServerController defines all client to server interactions.

  • Method Details

    • assertServerOnline

      public static void assertServerOnline()
      Asserts the server is online.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if it is not online (request failed).

    • getGameAsync

      public static ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Game getGameAsync(ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Game previous)
      Gets a game asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      previous - Previous Game.
      Returns:
      New Game.

    • getGame

      public static ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Game getGame(String gameId)
      Gets a Game from an id. Corresponds to GET '/games/{gameId}'.
      Parameters:
      gameId - Id of the Game the user wants to see.
      Returns:
      Game with corresponding gameId.

    • getGameActions

      public static ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Action[] getGameActions(String gameId)
      Gets all Action available to this player in the Game they are in. Corresponds to GET '/games/{gameId}/actions'.
      Parameters:
      gameId - Id of the Game the user wants to see.
      Returns:
      Array of Action that can be performed by the current player.

    • sendGameAction

      public static void sendGameAction(String gameId, int actionId)
      Sends the desired Action to the splendor server to be executed. Corresponds to PUT '/games/{gameId}/actions/{actionId}'.
      Parameters:
      gameId - Id of the Game the user wants to see.
      actionId - Id of the Action the user wants to execute.

    • sendCitySelection

      public static void sendCitySelection(String gameId, int cityId)
      Sends the desired City to the splendor server to be selected. Corresponds to PUT '/games/{gameId}/cityselection/{cityId}'
      Parameters:
      gameId - Id of the Game the user wants to see.
      cityId - Index of the City the user wants to select.

    • sendTradingPostTokenSelection

      public static void sendTradingPostTokenSelection(String gameId, String color)
      Sends the desired token selection to the splendor sever to be selected. This is for the trading post ability. Corresponds to PUT '/games/{gameId}/tokenselection/{color}'
      Parameters:
      gameId - Id of the Game the user wants to see.
      color - Color of the token the user wants to select.

    • createNewGame

      public static void createNewGame(String sessionId, ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.GameExtension extension)
      Creates a new Game. Corresponds to POST '/games/{sessionId}'.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Id of the Session the user is in.
      extension - GameExtension to use.

    • sendSaveGame

      public static void sendSaveGame(String sessionId)
      Sends the desired SaveGame to the splendor server to be saved. Corresponds to PUT '/games/{gameId}/actions/{actionId}'.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Id of the Session the user is in.

    • launchSessionFromSave

      public static void launchSessionFromSave(String username, ca.mcgill.nalmer.lsutilities.model.SaveGame savegame, ca.mcgill.nalmer.lsutilities.model.OauthToken token)
      Sends info to server to saved game can be launched. Corresponds to PUT '/savegames/map/{gameId}'.
      Parameters:
      username - creator of the new session.
      savegame - savegame object for this session.
      token - user's token.
